about_the_game: This DLC unlocks the 18+ Adult Content for "I Fell in Love with a Fantasy Farmer". In this DLC expect to see lesbian sex scenes that include both images of lesbian women having sexual and romantic relations and a tasty tale telling of the action!

content_descriptors.notes: Features graphic depictions of sexual acts, lesbian relationships, lesbian sex, consensual sex, mature and adult themes and strong language.
